description: OwnerReference contains enough information to let you identify an owning object. An owning object must be in the same namespace as the dependent, or be cluster-scoped, so there is no namespace field.

apiVersion.description: API version of the referent. The version part is required.

blockOwnerDeletion.description: If true, AND if the owner has the 'foregroundDeletion' finalizer, then the owner cannot be deleted from the key-value store until this reference is removed.  To set this field, a user needs 'delete' permission of the owner, otherwise 422 (Unprocessable Entity) will be returned.

controller.description: If true, this reference points to the managing controller.

kind.description: Kind of the referent. Currently this cannot be 'Event'.
